blog.description: What if life give you another chance to learn to love again?

posts.summary: To the One I Can't Have
posts.body:
prentisskelley:

To the One I Can’t Have

I’m in love with you.

Sorry.

I didn’t mean for this to happen…I swear. I never asked for any of this. All I wanted was a “hello” and to introduce myself.

I didn’t expect you to be so polite, so charming, or so amazing - I only expected we’d exchange a few words and forget we ever met. I had no idea that we would find ourselves wrapped in conversations for hours, and you’d be the only thing I could dream of for months on end. I didn’t know that there wouldn’t be anything I wanted more than to see you again…and my God, would I love to hold you.

I don’t know if I’ll ever speak to you again, let alone see you, or even be with you. I wish I could tell you how much this crushes me, but I know quite well that nothing is fair in love or war.

So, I’m in love with you.

Sorry.

posts.summary: ““Yes, it is you, and I am in love with you and I am going to be frank, because when you have an equal you can afford to be...
posts.body:
amargedom:

““Yes, it is you, and I am in love with you and I am going to be frank, because when you have an equal you can afford to be frank. I am happy about you, for you, with you. I adore you. You make me believe that anything is possible.””

— Henry Miller, from a letter to Anaïs Nin (via naturaekos)

posts.summary: "Stuck on you"
posts.body:
theaslan17:

“Stuck on you”

Your eyes, there’s so much hope in them and I feel scared to go back to that same old heart I used to have when all that matters was waiting, waiting for the day to come.

Last night, I dreamed again and it’s too far from what we are right now. We hold hands so tight and it hurts me after because I woke up with faith in my heart again. More so, I can’t tell you all of this because I know that I’m just a friend.

Prayers for you was never ceased. In my every heartbeat, I whispered to heaven. The stars saw me wept trying to stop my heart from singing your name.

I told you I understand everything to give you peace, to send you on your way away from me. You told me, you don’t want me to wait and the same pain I felt from that phrase was the same petition my heart screamed to the sky, hoping for another chance.

I beg the heaven to switch my heart, to help me met someone else, to help me abandon this love. Yet, I find myself going back to my knees asking God to move in between and help you noticed how much you mean to me.

A letter for the most loved, from an ordinary heart | Me To You.

Df.

posts.summary: Honesty hour: Ask me anything and ill be 100% honest, all questions answered.
posts.title: Honesty hour: Ask me anything and ill be 100% honest, all questions answered.
posts.body:
iamyourloststar:

greenshiefem:

“PUT A NUMBER IN MY ASK!” (all answered q will be permanently posted in my dash)

1.Who was the last person you held hands with?
2. Are you outgoing or shy?
3. Who are you looking forward to seeing?
4. Are you easy to get along with?
5. If you were drunk would the person you like take care of you?
6. What kind of people are you attracted to?
7. Do you think you’ll be in a relationship two months from now?
8. Who from the opposite gender is on your mind?
9. Does talking about sex make you uncomfortable?
10. Who was the last person you had a deep conversation with?
11. What does the most recent text that you sent say?
12. What are your 5 favorite songs right now?
13. Do you like it when people play with your hair?
14. Do you believe in luck and miracles?
15. What good thing happened this summer?
16. Would you kiss the last person you kissed again?
17. Do you think there is life on other planets?
18. Do you still talk to your first crush?
19. Do you like bubble baths?
20. Do you like your neighbors?
21. What are you bad habits?
22. Where would you like to travel?
23. Do you have trust issues?
24. Favorite part of your daily routine?
25. What part of your body are you most uncomfortable with?
26. What do you do when you wake up?
27. Do you wish your skin was lighter or darker?
28. Who are you most comfortable around?
29. Have any of your ex’s told you they regret breaking up?
30. Do you ever want to get married?
31. If your hair long enough for a pony tail?

33. Spell your name with your chin.
34. Do you play sports? What sports?
35. Would you rather live without TV or music?

37. What do you say during awkward silences?
38. Describe your dream girl/guy?

posts.body:
phalloid-destroyer:

osapoli:

theunnamedstranger:

siryouarebeingmocked:

phalloid-destroyer:

siryouarebeingmocked:

discourseamy:

phalloid-destroyer:

phalloid-destroyer:

cisnowflake:

phalloid-destroyer:

if you come crying about misandry to me you literally lose all the fucking credibility you have. Real world doesn’t fucking work that way. Get out of tumblr. Get the fuck out and see the real world. It’s so fucking sad that y'all literally are soooo deluded and brainwashed by mra propaganda. Really. Misandry is a LIE. It doesn’t exist. It just doesn’t. There are currently ZERO countries where women systematically oppress men. There are zero countries where men have their humanity and rights questioned because they’re male. Zero. 0. Total 0. Men literally, in every sense, hold all the power. For all the things men have done to women throughout millenias, they should be thankful that we are not waging war for revenge. Women are never and will never be as hateful and deranged. So shut the fuck up.

Misandry is a lie

M I S A N D R Y

I S

A

L I E

Anyway,

“For all the things men have done to women throughout millenias, they should be thankful that we are not waging war for revenge. Women are never and will never be as hateful and deranged.”

You’re a misandrist and a collectivist, so why should anyone take anything you say seriously? What makes you think YOU have any credibility?

Yet i don’t see any of you mras criticizing men collectively forcibly enslaving half of the population, denying basic human rights and autonomy for millennias or mass raping more than 2.500.000 and killing more than 240.000 women at similar rates at wars or having a term solely related to mass raping and killing women and children called “genocidal rape” where men systematically rape women (and little kids at both sexes), collectively, because they were women.

a man having normal problems related to average life isn’t fucking misandry. a woman being mean to a man isn’t misandry. Men until today have never had their humanity and basic rights questioned because they were males and will never have. Men never, ever needed governmental protection because they were systematically oppressed by women. Look, i made a helpful chart for you, i marked where men have been dehumanized, mass raped, enslaved and had their human rights forcibly taken away and oppressed by women and had their voting rights questioned.(every thing women went and still are going through) with red

See? Such unfairness right

Another helpful chart! Here’s list of world countries where men’s basic human rights were opposed and are a political debate!

Here’s the list of countries where women rioted for their basic human rights and when

Seems like the average is 1940/50, women have had basic human rights for around 78 years.

Given the first human civilization was built in 3000BC And now we live in 2018, men have them around 5018 years! By default, complete unquestioned rights.

Such misandry amirite. Here’s another list of countries where women STILL don’t have rights!

So, someone making a post on tumblr, criticizing so called “"misandry”“ is not, and will ever not be near, actual oppression women face and faced throughout millennias, hon.

@discourseamy look i have made a helpful guide post for you about misandry! :)

LMAO, you’re serious? This isn’t a troll? You’re actually showing me this embarrassing post with pride? Is your skull that thick?

All you proved is that you have ZERO reading comprehension skills. 

misandry =/= oppression of men

misandry = hatred of men

Learn how to read. 

> Look, i made a helpful chart for you, i marked where men have been dehumanized, mass raped, enslaved and had their human rights forcibly taken away and oppressed by women and had their voting rights questioned.(every thing women went and still are going through) with red

Wait a second. You think men have never been enslaved or dehumanized? Because there’s considerable overlap of the two. You think it was women doing all the work on plantations? Was it the ladies rowing galleys? I somehow doubt it.

Oh, wait, I see. You only care if it was done by women. Of course, plenty of women have owned slaves, so you’re still wrong.

Anyway honky, it was never on the base that they were born as males

and yes female slaves also participated in doing alot of work forced by the colonizing white men. Your point?

> Anyway honky,

Hmm?

>it was never on the base that they were born as males

Prove it. The Mamaluke soldiers spring to mind as a counterexample. Any women there?

> and yes female slaves also participated in doing alot of work forced by the colonizing white men. Your point?

Sorry, I meant “done to women”. 

BAHAHAHAHA SHE TRIED TO CALL YOU WHITE?!

> For all the things men have done to women throughout millenias, they should be thankful that we are not waging war for revenge. Women are never and will never be as hateful and deranged. So shut the fuck up.

I love this sentence. “Women would NEVER be as evil as those dirty men to wage war against them, but if we did it’d be totes justified because you did bad things to us before!”

Gotta keep that insurance, eh OP?

So I guess @phalloid-destroyer is a confirmed racist along with sexist. Just a typical Tumblr sjw.

yeah racist as in i called someone honky and they turned out to be black? aint y'all the same crowd who scream “THE BAR FOR RACISM IS SO LOW!!!!” then pull this shit lmfaoo

blog.name: liyasthomas
blog.title: Liyas Thomas
blog.description: What if life give you another chance to learn to love again?

posts.summary: Colour Asks
posts.title: Colour Asks
posts.body:
cinnasbooks:

laurentthings:

RED
Crimson - What was an event that’s shaped you to be who you are today?
Light Pink - Do you have stuffed animals?
Blush - Are you single?
Amaranth - What’s your favourite emotion?
Cherry Blossom - How are you feeling right now?
Hollywood Cerise - What are your ambitions?
Razzmatazz - Favourite TV Show?
Rose - Where do you feel most comfortable?
French Rose - What is your favourite flavour?
Cameo Pink - Favourite movie?

ORANGE
Buff Orange - Would you consider yourself athletic?
Burnt Sienna - Favourite smell?
Melon - Do you like to dance?
Carrot - Do you bake?
Copper - What is your favourite kind of day?
Orangeade - When do you feel alive?
Gamboge - Where do you want to travel?
Peach - Favourite texture/s?
Vermillion - How brave are you?
Bittersweet Shimmer - What is your favourite memory?

YELLOW
Flax - Do you like going to the beach?
Wheat - Who can you trust the most?
Laser Lemon - What kind of phone do you have?
Gold - Are you high maintenance?
Mellow Yellow - How calm are you?
Unmellow Yellow - How high energy are you?
Papaya Whip - How honest are you?
Transparent Yellow - Would you consider yourself to be special?
Canary - Favourite song?
Reed Yellow - Do you play an instrument?

GREEN
Pear - Where do you feel rested?
Olive - What is your favourite food?
Fern - Favourite plant?
Moss - Are you quiet or loud?
Tea green - How do you relax?
Celadon - Dream job?
Harlequin - Can you act?
Malachite - Do you speak more than one language?
Mantis - Favourite animal?
Seafoam Green - Do you like water?

BLUE
Sky Blue - Would you ever want to fly?
Periwinkle - Would you want to breathe underwater?
Powder Blue - Or control the weather?
Liberty - Become the president/prime minister?
Space Cadet - Become an astronaut?
Celeste - Have perfect pitch?
Eton Blue - Become invisible?
Indigo - Become immortal?
Iris - Grow plants at will?
Whispering Blue - Or teleport?

PURPLE
Lilac - Would you want kids?
Lavender - What is your favourite time of day?
Mulberry - Could you betray someone?
Eminence - Favourite sounds?
Palatinate - Do you think you’ll make it to 100 years old?
Prune - Do you ever think about dying?
Fandango - Do you spontaneously start singing sometimes?
Thistle - If you could become wise, rich, or intelligent, which would you rather?
Mauve - What would you name your kids/pets?
Royal Purple - What’s your favourite emotion?

OTHERS
Cream - If you had 1 day left to live, what would you do?
Silver - Are you a good person?
Ecru - How do you feel about the world today?
Auburn - Favourite colour?
White - Do you own lots of makeup?
Black - What is the greatest success of your life so far?
Bronze - Would you follow my blog?
Pink Nectar - What’s your aesthetic?
Sepia - Do you like photography?

These are so cool! Ask me some?

posts.body:
thepowerwithin:

“What would life be like if we weren’t constantly faced with new challenges? How would we grow? How would we improve, learn, and develop? Imagine how boring life would get. With nothing new to push us to our limits, how would we ever expand? So, take on new challenges with open arms. Allow them to teach you and help you to grow.”

— Nicole Addison @thepowerwithin

blog.title: Liyas Thomas
blog.description: What if life give you another chance to learn to love again?

posts.summary: I fucking hate it when you’re in such a fantastically giddy mood and then you see one simple little thing that makes you think,...
posts.body:
fini-mun:

squareclocks:

I fucking hate it when you’re in such a fantastically giddy mood and then you see one simple little thing that makes you think, “oh” and then you just get this empty feeling in your chest and you get nauseous and the world just crumbles and you want to just lay under a blanket and close your eyes and fall asleep and never wake up. 

From what my therapist told me, this happens because our emotions aren’t really on the ‘opposite’ ends like we tend to think of it. Happiness is not ‘up’ and sadness is not ‘down’-. In a way they’re actually right ‘next’ to each other.

If you’re super happy, it can turn into super sad very easily, because your emotions are already highly elevated and it’s only a very minor shift as far as your brain is concerned.

Knowing this can help you fight it, and it can help you be more aware of what’s going on while you’re happy and help avoid shifting towards misery.

I used to always wonder why it seemed like my happy days ‘couldn’t last’ or that bad things would ‘always’ happen when I was happy. It’s not that happiness is doomed to fail, it’s that emotions are volatile. I hope that helps people who experience this too- when you understand what’s going on more it’s easier to manage.

posts.summary: i don’t know how to not wake up before the sun does and i don’t know how to stay asleep through the slightest of the noise and...
posts.body:
justscribbledwords:

i don’t know how to not wake up before the sun does and i don’t know how to stay asleep through the slightest of the noise and people call me a light sleeper but i am not. i am anything but light and a light sleeper. what i am is a coward. i am always ready with one leg out of the door to run away at the slightest of the discomforts so yea the next time you see me up it isn’t because you made too much noise, it is because i am just way too scared to live and too brave to leave
